name: The Raised Man
description:
The Raised Man

by Circumpunk - KKB

Play as The Raised Man also known as Dr Jayvyn Quickthorn himself as he wakes up after being resurrected by Recondite. Undaunted he must continue his mission to stop Crossover Research's most dangerous projects.

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Mouse Button - Attack/Select
  • I - Inventory
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump
  • C -Crouch
  • R - Raise
  • K - Dismiss Thralls

Hello everyone, and thanks for checking out my game.

This is my entry for the Crossover Gamejam. This gamejam was about creating games that overlap in a shared universe. This game is an action shooter that features the characters I designed for the universe as well as subtley referencing some of the other characters created for the universe.

There was so much I wanted to do for this but as usual I overscoped by several thousand miles. I had originally planned 3 areas plus a boss fight with Dr Raven and his Thralls at the end. One of the areas would have been the animals settlement and another would have been the new underground lab being built by Raven.

I also had planned for you to be able to have animal mutant thralls and even non obvious thralls like tree monsters that had grown in Recondite soil.

For time I had to cut this right back and build all I could into the main area. I didn't even get to put Dr Raven in. Who knows maybe I'll have a look a adding this stuff later.

Contains universe references to:

  • Recondite, the mysterious metal, its abilities and effects.
  • CR (Crossover Research), the reclaimation teams, labs and secret projects.
  • Hazmat suit wearing humans
  • Lab animals/mutants, their settlement and king.

Design, Logic, Main Characters, Story designed by Circumpunk-KKB

Subtlely references other characters created for the Crossover Universe
